scripts.build:docs: npm run build:src && /bin/rm -rf ./docs; ./node_modules/typedoc/bin/typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown src/index.ts --githubPages false
scripts.publish:patch: npm run build:src && ./node_modules/standard-version/bin/cli.js --release-as patch && npm run publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm run build:src && ./node_modules/standard-version/bin/cli.js --release-as minor && npm run publish
scripts.publish:major: npm run build:src && ./node_modules/standard-version/bin/cli.js --release-as major && npm run publish
scripts.publish:version: npm run build:src && ./node_modules/standard-version/bin/cli.js --release-as $1 && npm run publish
scripts.publish: git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish
